member.name: M:RestServices.Controllers.ContactController.GetAllContacts
member.returns: Returns a list of all contacts in database
member.response: Returned if there is at lease 1 contact in database
Returned if the contact could not be retrieved
You need to be log (you can use the login and password you want)

member.name: M:RestServices.Controllers.ContactController.Get(System.Int32)
member.returns: Returns a contanct depending on the id
member.response: Returned if the contact is found in database
Returned if the contact could not be retrieved
You need to be log (you can use the login and password you want)

member.name: M:RestServices.Controllers.ContactController.PostAsync(OpenWebApiContract.Communication.Contact.CreateContactRequestV1)
member.returns: Create a contact. (the id is autoIncrement)
member.response: Returned if the contact have been corectly created
Returned if the contact could not be retrieved
You need to be log (you can use the login and password you want)

member.name: M:RestServices.Controllers.ContactController.Put(System.Int32,OpenWebApiContract.Communication.Contact.UpdateContactRequestV1)
member.returns: Update one contact depending on the id. Waring ! the id and the id inside the body have to be se same !
member.response: Returned if the contact have been corectly updated
Returned if the contact could not be retrieved
You need to be log (you can use the login and password you want)

member.name: M:RestServices.Controllers.ContactController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.returns: Delete one contact depending on the id.
member.response: Returned if the contact have been corectly Deleted
Returned if the contact could not be retrieved
You need to be log (you can use the login and password you want)
